value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Ugh! ...Bleh!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Are you...all right, Sharena?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Of course I'm not all right!$k$p$EFace_Pain|Of all the places, Commander Anna,
why do we have to clean up this
dusty old library?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Well, as you know, I met one
of my sisters from another world...$k$pShe gave me a cleaning product
that can make any stain—dirt, grime,
or rust—disappear!$k$pSo, naturally, we've got to test it!$k$p$EFace_Smile|And if it really works, we'll be
rolling in the profits! The Order of
Heroes, I mean...$k$p$EFace_Cool|...And now that you know, get to
wor—err... Let's keep testing!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|Ugh... I suppose if it's for the
Order of Heroes...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Oh, wow—look at this book, you two!
It looks like it's quite old. Hmm...
Let's see...$k$p$EFace_Anger|Wait a minute... Marth? Caeda? Leif,
Alm... Roy... There are so many
Heroes mentioned in here!$k$pCommander, wh-what is this book?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Ooh! I want to see! Does it have
any pictures?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Wait—Sharena! Be careful!$k$p$SspSE_EFFECT_ICEWALL_BREAK01|$SspSE_SPA_DIVE1|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh no! There goes the cleaner!
And all on one book too... What
a waste.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I-I'm so sorry! Can we dry the
book out? What do we do?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|It will be fine, Sharena. We'll
simply allow the book to dry, and
it will be almost good as new.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Right! We'll just open it up to
the wet pages so they can dry more
easily, and...$k$p$EFace_Pain|...Huh?! Th-the pages... They're
all...blank! And not just the wet
ones—ALL of them!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|What?! How is that possible!$k$p$EFace_Smile|You said it could remove any stain,
but I never expected it could remove
dried ink from a page!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...This can't be right.$k$p$EFace|Commander, is that really just a
simple cleaning solution?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I thought so... But it IS from another
world, so it's possible it behaves
strangely here in Askr...$k$pThere could be some magic in it that
helps it to remove stains...$k$p$EFace_Cool|But...the bigger problem here is that
this book is the Heroes' Saga.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|What's...the Heroes' Saga?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Yeah, what is this book exactly?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Well, you know the Heroes that
$Nu summons...$k$pIt's a collection of tales and
descriptions of their worlds.$k$pWithout it, we won't be able to
familiarize ourselves with their
worlds and their histories.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh no! That's terrible! I want
to know all there is to know
about the Heroes!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|They are out there risking their
lives to help us with our fight.$k$pIt would be extremely rude of us
to not bother to get to know their
worlds' stories as best we can!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Hm... Then we all agree.$k$p$EFace|I am hereby announcing a new
mission for all active members of
the Order of Heroes!$k$p$EFace_Cool|We will send scout parties to
the other worlds and recover the
lore lost from the Heroes' Saga!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What?! You want US to do it?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Of course! And we'll need the
assistance of the Heroes too.$k$pHmm... And I bet we can recover
important lore faster if we send out
those familiar with the world!$k$p$EFace_Smile|Now... Let's get out there and
recover those lost sagas and
restore our historical records!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|A-are we historians now? ...Wow!
This is great! I've already got a bit
of experience.$k$p$EFace_Smile|All right! Let's do this, Alfonse!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Hmph...$k$p$EFace_Smile|Why do I get the feeling this will
be a bigger task than we expect...$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Emergency meeting, everyone!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|What's wrong, Commander Anna?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|It's about the world we've been
visiting... The strikes have been too
successful—and it's changing things!$k$pOur involvement in an important
battle has nearly reversed the course
of history as we know it...$k$pAt this rate, we could change the
entire course of the world's history!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What?! Th-that can't be possible!
How did this happen?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|It's seems that our excursions have
had somewhat more impact than we
anticipated... But we can't ignore it.$k$p$EFace_Cool|We'll have to send in reinforcements
to get history back on the right track!$k$p$EFace_Anger|Just be careful about who you select
to be sent out as reinforcements.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|This kind of thing happens when
traveling between worlds. Nothing to
worry about, $Nu.$k$pMy recommendation is to send
Heroes who hail from that world.
They'll know what to do!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|That's right! But the choice of who
exactly you want to send is in your
hands, $Nu!$k$p
